name: Ta-Chun Lin | TC.
summary: I love programming and technology! Aside from my industrial experience, I once ran my own software development business, JAStudio Technology (https://jastudio-tech.com/). I have a strong background in full-stack software development and machine learning, with experience in training AI models for industrial defect detection and developing software systems. These projects required me to apply software architectural patterns like MVC and object-oriented design patterns such as the Factory Method. For me, a career is a life ambition, and together, we can achieve remarkable milestones.

Awards: 3x QUT Executive Dean's Commendation for Academic Excellence (GPA: 6.83/7.0, 98%)
QUT Best ML Research Paper Awards 2023 (Faculty Level)
Selected Representative of Master of Information Technology.

workExperience.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job_summary: Satellites Anomaly Detection: Led the development of a satellite health monitoring system processing TB-scale data from 10,000+ sensors, architecting the data backend with SQL, MongoDB, Redis, and MinIO to support a hybrid suite of PyTorch models with a Human-in-the-Loop (HITL) feedback system for continuous refinement.

Aviation Audio Congestion Analysis: Designed a generative agentic AI system for noisy transmission analysis, using Spark on a Hadoop cluster for audio data ETL before fine-tuning STT and LLM models with PyTorch and LangChain.

MLOps IaaS Platform: Engineered a modular, self-service MLOps platform that supports multi-users to automate the full ML lifecycle; orchestrated complex pipelines with Airflow, managed experiments with MLflow, and designed the distributed architecture for enterprise-grade reliability and scalability.

workExperience.title: AI Engineer
job_summary: Industrial Defect Detection: Delivered a ~50% reduction in the missed detection rate by implementing and fine-tuning SoTA computer vision models (classification, detection, segmentation) on the platform, optimizing the trade-off between model yield and overkill rate.

End-to-End Edge AI Platform: Engineered a full-stack Edge AI training and data management platform using PyTorch, Flask, React, MongoDB, and Azure. The system allows the clients to manage image datasets, train models, and deploy version-controlled solutions directly to edge devices.

workExperience.title: Software Engineer
workExperience.company: Sinon Corporation Business Groups, KSI Inc.
job_summary: Government Smart ERP System: Implemented SoA ML techniques of the time (e.g., Bag-of-Words and n-grams) to ERP systems. Built with .NET MVC, MSSQL, and AngularJS; optimized performance with SQL stored procedures; CRUD performed on over 100,000+ data entries per query.

workExperience.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job_summary: AI Agent for ERP Systems: Engineered AI agents with tools by fine-tuning an open-source LLM with a RAG pipeline. This enabled users to perform conversational queries against business documents directly within the core ERP system, automating information retrieval.

Industrial-Scale CI/CD & MLOps: Architected a complete CI/CD pipeline using Azure Functions for automated builds, vulnerability scanning, and production packaging. Separately, established the end-to-end MLOps lifecycle, using MLflow for model versioning and Airflow for orchestrating complex deployment workflows.
